name: Almond-Crusted Salmon and Salad
author: Test2365
summary: This tasty and versatile almond-crusted salmon makes a quick weeknight dish for four.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
½ teaspoon Himalayan salt, or to taste
directions: Preheat the oven to 500 degrees F (260 degrees C)
Grease a baking pan with 1 tablespoon olive oil
Mix remaining olive oil, 1 teaspoon lemon juice, salt, and black pepper together in a bowl to form the salad dressing
Brush salmon fillets with remaining 1 teaspoon lemon juice
Sprinkle with Himalayan salt and black pepper
Cover top and sides of salmon with almonds
Place salmon skin-side down in the prepared baking pan
Sprinkle any remaining almonds on top, pressing gently to adhere
Bake in the preheated oven until salmon flakes easily with a fork, about 15 minutes
Let cool; cut each fillet in half
Place spinach and tomatoes in a bowl
